descmd: The changes in this technical correction to US Core have been reviewed and commented upon by the public through the HL7 errata process. The HL7 International Cross-Group Projects work group members have agreed to and voted on the resolution of the community comments. For a detailed list of the changes for this version, see the [Change Notes](http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/STU8/changes.html).
